metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14953 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The mail message display page in SquirrelMail through 1.4.22 has XSS via a "<math xlink:href=" attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14953` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

squirrelmail - 2:1.4.23~svn20120406-2+deb8u3ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: squirrelmail package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.4.23~svn20120406-2+deb8u3ubuntu0.16.04.1').
